sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./About.css"; const About = () => ( 
        
{`> booting portfolio...
> loading Apichet's credentials...
> system online ‚úì
> type "skills" or "projects" to begin`}

About Me

Hello! I'm Apichet ‚Äî a risk-driven problem solver passionate about transforming traditional insurance operations with modern technology.
Whether coordinating port risk mitigation or building a self-service car insurance platform, I thrive where business meets data and logic meets real-world complexity.

üíº Experience Timeline

{[ { title: "2022 ‚Äì Present | Insurance Coordinator, Kerry Siam Seaport", bullets: [ "Performed 200+ infrastructure damage surveys and coordinated with legal & insurers", "Introduced analytics tools (Power BI) to track accident patterns and insurance losses", "Developed incident logging tools improving accuracy and response time" ] }, { title: "2021 ‚Äì 2022 | CTO & Co-Founder, Cheetah Insurance Broker", bullets: [ "Engineered real-time comparison engine for car insurance using Flask + React", "Led end-to-end deployment with cloud hosting, payment integration (2C2P), and SEO", "Acted as full-stack developer and business strategist in an InsurTech startup model" ] }, { title: "2015 ‚Äì 2021 | Head of Claims Control, Tokio Marine", bullets: [ "Managed vehicle claim approvals and escalated legal/negotiation cases", "Oversaw team operations, broker coordination, and regulatory liaison (OIC, court)" ] }, { title: "2012 ‚Äì 2015 | Car Insurance Operations, Muangthai Insurance", bullets: ["Executed policy issuance, endorsements, and client communications"] } ].map((item, idx) => ( {item.title}
{item.bullets.map((line, i) => (
- {line}
))} ))}

üß† Technical & Analytical Skills

{[ "Python", "JavaScript", "PHP", "React", "Flask", "SQL", "BigQuery", "Power BI", "AppSheet", "Tableau", "HTML", "CSS", "WordPress", "2C2P Gateway", "RESTful API", "Wireshark", "JWT", "Cloudflare", "Google Sheets", "MS Office 365" ].map((skill, idx) => ( {skill} ))}

üéì Education

Ramkhamhaeng University
Bachelor of Arts in Mass Communication (2007 ‚Äì 2011)

üìÇ Proof of Capability

üß† Key Contributions
  • Built secure upload system for insurance documents with token auth
  • Integrated 2C2P payments with base64 cert parsing in Flask backend
  • Designed BQ ‚Üí Flask ‚Üí React flow for dynamic price calculation
  • Developed containerized app using Dockerfile + docker-compose
  • Modularized Axios API calls and refactored data fetching utils
üìÅ Project Structure Highlights
  • /backend ‚Äì Flask API: auth, pricing, file uploads
  • /frontend ‚Äì React SPA with quote calculator & chatbot
  • /uploads ‚Äì Secure folder for documents
  • Dockerfile & docker-compose.yml ‚Äì DevOps stack
  • .b64 certs ‚Äì For secure 2C2P integration
üîç View GitHub Repository
); export default About;
